name: Final Coding Project

images.description: Final project grading rubric with point allocations: Completion (320 pts), GitHub (280 pts), Errors (140 pts), Video (60 pts)
Final project assignment details and requirements

rubricDescription: This is the final project where students create a React application that connects to an API and includes CRUD operations. The rubric evaluates completion (320 pts), GitHub repository setup (280 pts), errors/functionality (140 pts), and video explanation (60 pts), for a total of 800 possible points.
